programme.title: Так далеко, так близко
programme.desc: Настя с сыном Иваном впервые за долгие годы приехали в город из деревни староверов. Их окружает чужой, непривычный, полный опасностей и соблазнов мир.

programme.title: Так далеко, так близко
programme.desc: Настя с сыном Иваном впервые за долгие годы приехали в город из деревни староверов. Их окружает чужой, непривычный, полный опасностей и соблазнов мир.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: When Do We Eat?
programme.desc: A familys Passover gets screwy after the patriarch unknowingly ingests a hit of Ecstasy.

programme.title: Love Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Samir, must face his parents breakup. While they meet to find the way to tell him, the little Samir surprises them, because he knows perfectly whats happening, putting his own parents into a hard place with his vision of the situation.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. Uneducated, she relies on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: The spoiled rotten and utterly unlikable rich kid George Amberson becomes horrified when his recently widowed mother rekindles her relationship with the wealthy Eugene Morgan, who she left decades earlier in order to marry Georges father. As George struggles to sabotage his mothers new romance, he must deal with his own romantic feelings for Morgans daughter and the consequences of his meddling as his once great family falls into ruin due to his machinations...

programme.title: The Recall
programme.desc: When five friends vacation at a remote lake house they expect nothing less than a good time, unaware that planet Earth is under an alien invasion and mass-abduction.

programme.title: Wake
programme.desc: When things get tough for offbeat Carys Reitman, she does what any emotionally isolated, modern girl would do - she goes to strangers funerals. At one fateful funeral, she unexpectedly meets Tyler, a man mourning his fiancee. Despite the warnings of her undertaker best friend Shane and her roommate Lila, she finds herself connecting to someone for the first time. Searching for answers, Carys goes to see her estranged mother to confront her past. And as she tries to open herself to the risks of love with Tyler, she realizes she may have more to fear than just a broken heart.

programme.title: 4Got10
programme.desc: Brian Barnes (Johnny Messner) wakes up in the desert wounded and with no memory and no idea why hes surrounded by eight bodies, a van with four million in cash and a van full of cocaine. Brian is pursued by not only notorious drug lord Danny Perez (Danny Trejo) who desperately want his money back, and DEA Agent Rooker (Dolph Lundgren), but also a by the corrupt Sheriff Olson (Michael Pare) who will stop at nothing to get his hand on the new found fortune. On the run, Brian discovers the more he remembers the less he wants to know about who he really is.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: The Sandman
programme.desc: One fine morning, Benno finds sand in his bed. While he tries to ignore this at first, he soon must realize that he himself is loosing the sand. Day after day the sand increases and soon his time literally starts running short. Finally he is left no choice but to ask Sandra for help, who runs a small coffee shop under his apartment. Although Benno hates her with a passion, he started having dreams of her every night. What could Sandra and the dreams have to do with the sand?

programme.title: Foolproof
programme.desc: Kevin, Samantha and Rob live for Foolproof; their own private club where through high-tech, meticulously thought out and executed plans, they pull off the most impossible of heists - all in theory that is. Theyve never actually done it for real. But all that changes when Leo, a cutthroat British gangster, rips off their foolproof plans for a diamond heist and uses it to successfully execute the robbery. Threatening to implicate them, Leo blackmails them to pull off a robbery worth $20 million in corporate bonds.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Music critic Bob is out of a job, addicted to Zoloft, and trying to wrangle the menagerie of animals that his wife Amy has accumulated. Will adopting a baby cure their existential angst? Or should they just rescue another duck?

programme.title: Zen Noir
programme.desc: A nameless "noir" detective, still mourning the loss of his wife, investigates a mysterious death in a Buddhist temple, but his logical, left-brained crime-solving skills are useless in the intuitive, non-linear world of Zen.

programme.title: The War Is Over
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim - the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: Miss Nobody
programme.desc: Unlucky in love, living at home with her eccentric mom, and stuck in a dead end secretarial job at Judge Pharmaceuticals, Sarah Jane longs for more out of life. Her surprise promotion to junior executive appears to be just the ticket. But with promotion comes a competitive new world of wily, complicated executives, and Sarah Jane begins to eliminate the competition the only way she knows how - murder. During her climb to the top, she unexpectedly falls for the man of her dreams, Detective Bill Malloy - the cop intent on cracking the case of the mysterious deaths at Judge Pharmaceuticals.

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: Black Cop
programme.desc: Follow the contradictory and challenging story of an African Canadian cop. He has been attacked by his fellow officers and becomes the victim of racial profiling. The policeman is struggling between duty and moral obligation, and is pushed over the edge. He decides to take revenge on his community.

programme.title: Simona
programme.desc: Kinorežisoram Viktoram Taranskim ir apnikušas aktieru mūžīgās kaprīzes un ultimāti. Bet nu viņš ir atradis ideālu aktrisi - visskaistāko, vistalantīgāko, kas nekad neiebilst un nekad neko neprasa. Tiešām žēl, ka Simone eksistē... tikai virtuāli, nav nekas vairāk kā datora kods, nulles un vieninieki. Taču arī savus straujos panākumus Taranskis apturēt nevēlas, īstenībā neeksistējošās aktrises faniem vilšanos sagādāt negrib, tāpēc cenšas saglabāt intrigu un neatklāt patiesību cik vien iespējams ilgi.

programme.title: Seifs
programme.desc: Madride, Spānija, 2010. Kamēr visa pilsēta seko līdzi valstsvienības veiksmīgai dalībai Pasaules kausa izcīņā, pārdrošu zagļu grupa meklē ceļu uz vienu no visdrošākajām un vislabāk apsargātajām vietām uz planētas.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Sniegainā Igaunija

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Simona
programme.desc: Kinorežisoram Viktoram Taranskim ir apnikušas aktieru mūžīgās kaprīzes un ultimāti. programme.title: Ērina Brokoviča
programme.desc: Jaunajai trīs bērnu mātei, kas divreiz šķīrusies, ir tikai pamata izglītība, un viņa nevar atrast darbu, lai pārveidotu savu dzīvi. Pēc neveiksmīgas prasības tiesā pret bagātu ārstu, kura auto viņu reiz notrieca ceļmalā, Ērina konstatē, ka nav spējīga pat apmaksāt pieticīgo dzīvokli. Viņa riskē un dodas uz sava advokāta Eda Masrija kantori, lai pieteiktos darbā. Sākotnēji viņš nevēlas sievietei dot darbu, taču Ērina atsakās samierināties ar noraidījumu. Par spīti pretrunīgajam raksturam viņai izdodas šo darbu dabūt. Tobrīd Edam vēl nav ne jausmas, ka viņš pieņēmis visnozīmīgāko lēmumu viņu abu dzīvēs.

programme.title: Seifs
programme.desc: Madride, Spānija, 2010. Kamēr visa pilsēta seko līdzi valstsvienības veiksmīgai dalībai Pasaules kausa izcīņā, pārdrošu zagļu grupa meklē ceļu uz vienu no visdrošākajām un vislabāk apsargātajām vietām uz planētas.

programme.title: Džokers
programme.desc: Artūrs Fleks - ballīšu klauns un neveiksmīgs stand-up komiķis - dzīvo nabadzīgu dzīvi kopā ar savu slimo māti. Kad sabiedrība viņu atstumj un uzskata par ķēmu, viņš nolemj pieņemt haosa pilno dzīvi Gotemas pilsētā.

programme.title: Ananasu ekspresis
programme.desc: KĀds vīrs un viņa marihuānas tirgotājs aizbēg no slepkavām un korumpēta policista. Viņš kļuvis par liecinieku tam, kā viņa tirgotāja boss nogalina konkurentu.

programme.title: Mans draugs zombijs
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad ļoti neparasts zombijs izglābj vēl dzīvu meiteni no uzbrukuma, abi izveido attiecības, kas aizsāk visu nedzīvo pasauli pārveidojošus notikumus.

programme.title: Džuno
programme.desc: Saskārusies ar negaidītu grūtniecību, jauna sieviete pieņem pašaizliedzīgu lēmumu sava vēl nedzimušā bērna sakarā.

programme.title: Pasūtījums
programme.desc: Klusā okeāna ziemeļrietumu kopienas satrauca vairākas banku un automašīnu laupīšanas. Vientuļš FIB aģents uzskata, ka noziegumi nebija finansiāli motivētu noziedznieku darbs, bet gan bīstamu pašmāju teroristu grupa.

programme.title: Brīvības skaņa
programme.desc: Neticams, bet tomēr patiess stāsts par bijušo valdības aģentu, kurš kļuvis par modru modrības sargu. Viņš devies bīstamā misijā, lai glābtu simtiem bērnu no cilvēku tirgotājiem.

programme.desc: Pēc nopietnas slēpošanas traumas Tonija nonākusi rehabilitācijas centrā. Atkarīga no medicīnas personāla un pretsāpju līdzekļiem, viņa velta laiku, lai atcerētos vētraino mīlasstāstu, ko piedzīvoja kopā ar Džordžio.

programme.title: Stāsts par Levinu Deivisu
programme.desc: Drāma par vienu nedēļu kāda jauna folka dziedātāja dzīvē, kurš iepazīst Griničvilidžas folkmūzikas pasauli. Ar ģitāru plecā viņš cīnās ar skarbo Ņujorkas ziemu un cenšas kļūt par īstu mūziķi, saskaroties ar šķietami nepārvaramiem šķēršļiem, turklāt dažus no tiem rada viņš pats.

programme.title: Neticamais stāsts par Bendžaminu Batonu
programme.desc: Filmas pamatā ir F. Skota Ficdžeralda stāsts par Bendžaminu Batonu, kurš piedzimis sirmā vecumā un laika gaitā paliek aizvien jaunāks. Neparastie notikumi aizsākas Pirmā pasaules kara beigās, Ņūorleānā un sniedzas līdz 21. gadsimtam - tas ir stāsts par cilvēku, kurš tāpat kā mēs visi, nespēj ietekmēt laika ritējumu un viņa dzīve ir tikpat neparasta, cik tā var būt jebkuram no mums.

programme.title: Bens ir atgriezies
programme.desc: Deviņpadsmitgadīgais Bens Bērnss aizbēg no rehabilitācijas centra un negaidīti atgriežas mājās tieši uz Ziemassvētkiem. Bena māte Holija priecājas satikt dēlu, taču raizējas, vai viņš neatsāks lietot narkotikas. Turpmāko 24 stundu laikā gaismā nāk dažādi noslēpumi, un māte dara visu, lai pasargātu dēlu no lielām briesmām.

programme.title: 20. gadsimta sievietes
programme.desc: Trīs sievietes, trīs stāsti, trīs likteņi - triju paaudžu ekrāna dīvas Anete Beninga, Elle Faninga un Grēta Gērviga dzīvā un optimistiskā stāstā par sievietēm pagājušā gadsimta 70-to gadu Kalifornijā.

programme.title: Fabelmeni
programme.desc: Augot Arizonā pēc Otrā pasaules kara, jaunais Semijs Fabelmens pusaudža gados vēlas kļūt par kinorežisoru. Drīz vien viņš atklāj satriecošu ģimenes noslēpumu un pēta, kā filmu spēks var palīdzēt viņam saskatīt patiesību.

programme.title: Vīns un vējš
programme.desc: Trīsdesmitgadnieks Žans kopš 20 gadu vecuma ir ceļojis pa pasauli, saraujot visas saites gan ar ģimeni, gan Burgundiju, kur pagāja viņa bērnība. Pēkšņi viņš no ārzemēm tiek atsaukts uz dzimto Franciju, jo viņa tēvs guļ uz nāves gultas.

programme.title: Sauszemes kauns
programme.desc: Satraukts bijušais krāpnieks ieradies Maltā, lai tur sastaptos ar ievērojamām grūtībām hedoniskajā zviedru emigrantu sabiedrībā.

programme.title: Tālu no trokšņainā pūļa
programme.desc: Viktorijas laikmeta Anglijā neatkarīgā un stūrgalvīgā Batšeba Everdena ir lepna un skaista sieviete, kura piesaista triju dažādiem sabiedrības slāņiem piederošu vīriešu uzmanību. Pēc Batšebas tikšanās ar aitu fermas īpašnieku Gabriēlu Ouku pārgalvīgo seržantu Frensisu Troju un turīgo vecpuisi Viljamu Boldvudu, viņu dzīves vairs nekad nebūs tādas, kā iepriekš.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Chauhan V. Lofaso
programme.desc: Twelve new chefs serve up their signature flavours on Texas toast for team captains Bobby Flay, Maneet Chauhan and Antonia Lofaso.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Super Mega Cakes
programme.desc: In the final, the teams make alien invasion cakes. Next, 50 cake fans decide which of the six winning cakes will take home the $40,000 grand prize.

programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 4. Cooking show.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 5. Cooking show.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Bobbys Triple Threat
programme.desc: Chef Kevin Tien pushes Bobby Flays Titans to the limit. Plus, everything is put on the line for judge Chris Scott in an epic battle of "Cajun Asian" flavours.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Symon
programme.desc: Join our hosts, renowned celebrity chefs and restaurateurs Bobby Flay and Michael Symon, as they test the skills of eight expert barbecue connoisseurs. Filmed at the Star Hill Ranch in Austin, Texas, the eight chefs are divided into two teams but, in order to claim first pick for their team, Bobby and Michael go head-to-head in a backyard BBQ challenge. Each episode sees one of the chefs being eliminated from the show until there is only one left, the winner who is awarded the title of Master of Cue. The weekly contests aim to reveal the chefs talents and expose their weaknesses and include tasks such as cooking up a tomahawk rib-eye and taking on a Texas beef challenge.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
programme.desc: Inspired by the legendary Forbidden Forest, hosts James and Oliver Phelps challenge the teams to create a 3-foot-tall, gravity-defying showpiece.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: In hour 16, the eight remaining chefs work in teams while handling three culinary curveballs to impress judges Carlos Anthony and Brian Malarkey.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon serves a flavourful fiesta of grilled oysters with chorizo butter, Chile lime creamed corn with garden tomatoes and Tres leches.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon celebrates his wife, Liz, using her favourite flavour, lemon! He prepares lemon ricotta ravioli with cacio e pepe sauce.

programme.title: The Last Day of the Dictator
"Back to Black"
programme.desc: Filma "Back to Black" ir stāsts par 21.gs. zvaigzni Eimiju Vainhausu no pusaudzes gadiem līdz pasaulslavenā albuma "Back to Black" tapšanai, atklājot neatkārtojamo radošo dzirksti, asprātību un atklātību, kā arī cenšoties izprast viņas dēmonus. Albums "Back To Black" ieguva 5 Grammy balvas, un ir viens no visvairāk pārdotajiem albumiem. Tajā ir Eimijas sirdspuksti, skaļāki ar katru sirdssāpi, katra dziesma ir viņas un Bleika mīlas stāsts.

programme.title: Nezvēri
programme.desc: No dzimtenes izceļojis franču pāris Spānijas laukos vada organisko saimniecību, taču rodas nesaskaņas ar vietējiem ciemata iedzīvotājiem.

programme.title: Zirnekļtīkls
programme.desc: Astoņus gadus vecais Pīters ik vakaru savas istabas sienās dzird dīvainu klauvēšanu. Viņa vecāki Kerola un Marks apgalvo, ka pie vainas Pītera spilgtā iztēle, taču zēns ir pārliecināts: šajā mājā kaut kas nav kārtībā. Un pamazām atklājas tumšs noslēpums, ko tik cītīgi glabājuši viņa vecāki.

programme.title: Konklāvs
programme.desc: Pēc pāvesta negaidītās nāves katoļu kardinālu kolēģija sapulcējas Vatikānā uz vēlēšanām, lai izvēlētos jauno pāvestu un iezīmētu jauno baznīcas laikmetu. Aiz Siksta kapelas slēgtajām durvīm kardināli no visas pasaules sacenšas par šo godu rūpīgi sargātā rituālā, kas sakņojas gadsimtiem tālā pagātnē. Kardinālam Lorensam (Reifs Fainss), kardinālu kolēģijas dekānam, ir svētais pienākums pārraudzīt šo konklāvu.

programme.title: Dziedi!
programme.desc: Kad viņa teātrim draud slēgšana, uzņēmējdarbībā pieredzējušais koala Basters Mūns (Metjū Makkonahijs) sarīko dziesmu konkursu. Daudziem vietējiem zvēriem tas rada iespēju izpausties. Cūka Rosita (Rīza Viterspūna) ir māte un mājsaimniece, kura atteicās no pusaudža sapņa kļūt par dziedātāju. Pusaudze dzeloņcūka Eša (Skārleta Johansone) ir pancīga roķere alternatīvās mūzikas grupā. Gorillu Džoniju (Tārons Edžertons) viņa tēvs (Pīters Serafinovičs) grib pārliecināt pievērsties savam banku aplaupītāja arodam. Ikkatrs no šiem radījumiem vēlas piepildīt savu sapni un dziedāt no visas sirds!

programme.title: Van Gogs. Pie mūžības vārtiem
programme.desc: Gleznotāja Van Goga dzīvesstāsts par laiku, ko viņš pavadīja Francijā, Arlā.

programme.title: Kina un Juks: Polārlapsu piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Divu lapsu piedzīvojums laikā, kad tās gatavojas pirmo reizi kļūt par vecākiem un globālā sasilšana maina likumus visiem – gan dabai, gan dzīvniekiem,

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Zvirbulis Ričijs kopš dzimšanas pieņemts stārķu ģimenē, visi viņu ļoti mīl, viņš ātri aug un jūtas kā īsts stārķis. Taču gājputniem stārķiem pienāk laiks lidot uz Āfriku, lai tur ziemotu. Ģimene ir spiesta atklāt Ričijam viņa izcelšanos, jo lidot kopā nedrīkst – grūtajā ceļojumā zvirbulis var iet bojā. Drosminieks negrasās nolaist spārnus un nolemj visiem pierādīt, ka ir īsts stārķis. Ričijs viens pats dodas ceļā, un viņam pievienojas jauni draugi – pūce Olga un papagailis Kiki.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Ričards ir jauns zvirbulēns, kuru savā lokā pieņēmusi stārķu ģimene. Viņš pavada ziemu Āfrikas ziemeļos, taču ir pienācis laiks atgriezties mājās. Ričards vēlas vadīt gājputnu kāsi, bet šim uzdevumam tiek izraudzīts viņa pusbrālis Makss. Jaunais putnēns jūtas aizvainots, taču drīz sākas vētrains piedzīvojums. Tirāniskais pāvs Zamano sagūsta Ričarda draugu. Zamano atsakās viņu laist brīvībā, kamēr Ričards neatrisinās mīklu un neatradīs Zamano dārgakmeni.

programme.title: Slepenā mītne
programme.desc: Raiens Reinoldss tēlo jaunu CIP aģentu Metu Vestonu, kurš strādā slepenā mītnē Keiptaunā, Dienvidāfrikā, kad tiek notverts vismeklētākais bijušais CIP aģents Tobins Frosts (Denzels Vašingtons) un nogādāts šajā mītnē. Frosta nopratināšanas laikā mītnē iebrūk algotņi, kuri vēlas notvert Frostu. Vestons un Frosts izglābjas, taču viņi būs drošībā tikai tad, kad atradīs citu drošu mītni.

programme.title: Alita: Kaujas eņģelis
programme.desc: Pasauli iznīcinājis Lielais karš, sagraujot ikvienu pilsētu savā ceļā, izņemot to, zem kuras trīssimt gadu laikā ir izaugusi vēl viena, kur iedzīvotāji cīnās par labklājības druskām no virszemes. Apakšējās pilsētas izgāztuvē tādējādi nonāk arī kādas kiborgmeitenes atliekas, un doktoram Ido šķiet, ka viņa ir pārsteidzoši līdzīga briesmīgajiem kaujas eņģeļiem, kas reiz piedalījās Lielajā karā.

programme.title: Krūdi
programme.desc: Aizvēsturiska piedzīvojumu komēdija par pasaules pirmo ģimeni, kura dodas unikālā ceļojumā, kad viņu dzimtā ala tiek iznīcināta. Ceļojot pa elpu aizraujošajām ainavām, Krūdi atklāj pasakainu, jaunu vietu, kur mīt vēl neredzētas būtnes. Viņu pasaules uztvere mainās uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Grū ģimenē ir papildinājums - Grū juniors. Kad tētis Grū sastopas ar jaunu ienaidnieku – atriebīgo Maksimu Lemālu un viņa liktenīgo sievieti Valentīnu –, visa ģimene ir spiesta atstāt mājas, doties uz slepeno mītni skaistajā Meifloverā un mēģināt iekļauties vietējā sabiedrībā zem slepena vārda. Taču te ir kāds, kas zina, kas patiesībā ir Grū, un piedzīvojumi var sākties!

programme.title: Balerīna
programme.desc: Slepkava, apmācīta Ruska Roma organizācijas tradīcijās, dodas atriebt tēva nāvi.

programme.title: Algoritms
programme.desc: Lilija Čana, kuru atveido aktrise Sonoja Mizuno, ir datorinženiere Silīcija ielejas tehnoloģiju uzņēmumā "Amaija". Viņas draugam, Karla Glusmana spēlētājam varonim Sergejam, kas arī strādā šajā uzņēmumā par kiberdrošības speciālistu, piedāvā iespēju piedalīties jaunā kvanta skaitļošanas projektā "Devs". Projektu vada "Amaijas" noslēpumainais izpilddirektors Forests, kas neko daudz negrib izpaust. Neilgi pēc iesaistīšanās projektā Sergejs pazūd. Lilija ir pārliecināta, ka tas saistāms ar jaunajiem darba pienākumiem. Ar bijušā drauga Džeimija palīdzību viņa sāk šķetināt iespējamos pazušanas iemeslus, bet vienu versiju nomaina cita, un lieta kļūst aizvien mistiskāka.

programme.title: Džumandži: Laipni lūgti džungļos
programme.desc: Četri vidusskolēni atrod vecu spēļu konsoli ar līdz šim neredzētu videospēli džumandži. Viņi iesaistās šajā spēlē, kas norisinās džungļos, un iemiesojas pašu izraudzītajos avataros. Jaunieši apjauš, ka džumandži ir kas vairāk par spēli, tā ir cīņa par izdzīvošanu. Lai uzvarētu spēlē, viņiem jādodas bīstamākajā piedzīvojumā mūžā, jāatklāj Alana Periša pirms 20 gadiem atstātās pēdas un jāmaina priekšstats pašiem par sevi, pretējā gadījumā viņi paliks ieslēgti spēlē uz visiem laikiem...

programme.title: 47 ronini
programme.desc: Kādu dienu medību laikā Ako valdnieks Asano un viņa samuraji mežā atrod kādu vīru un aizved viņu uz pili. Pēc vairākiem gadiem valdnieks Asano rīko turnīru, lai godinātu komandiera ierašanos Ako. Turnīra vakarā valdnieku Asano nobur, lai viņš savainotu Nagato valdnieku Kiru. Komandieris piespriež Asano sodu - pašnāvību. Sapratuši, ka tas bijis valdnieka Kiras ļaunais plāns, samuraji un atradenis, ignorējot komandiera pavēles, dodas atriebties.

programme.title: Lepnā princese
programme.desc: Jaunajam un izskatīgajam karalim Bendžaminam ir pienācis laiks precēties. Viņu savaldzina princeses Karolīnas portrets. Kad princese viņu atraida, karalis, pārģērbies par dārznieku, iekļūst Karolīnas pilī un iekaro viņas sirdi.

programme.title: Robotu sapņi
programme.desc: Suņa un robota piedzīvojumi un neveiksmes Ņujorkā 80.-ajos gados.

programme.title: Troļļi
programme.desc: Troļļi ir mazi un laimīgi radījumi, kuri savā pasaulē nodarbojas ar dziedāšanu, apskaušanos un būšanu laimīgiem. Tomēr viņu idilli mežā pārtrauc bergeni, kuri atklāj viņu atrašanās vietu un kuri ir milzu monstri, kas ir nepārtraukti nelaimīgi. Monstri atklāj, ka viņi var kļūt laimīgi, ja apēd troļļus. Troļļi glābjas, un viņus caur slepeniem tuneļiem vada karalis Pepijs. Pēc divām desmitgadēm Pepija meita Popija organizē izsmalcinātas svinības par godu tam, ka viņi ir izglābušies. Vientulīgais izdzīvošanas speciālists Zars pret to iebilst, jo uztraucas, ka troksnis varētu piesaistīt bergenus. Viņam izrādās taisnība, un bergeni nolaupa daudzus troļļus. Popija dodas glābšanas misijā, un Zars dodas viņai līdzi, jo neuzskata, ka Popija būs drošībā. Viņi ierodas bergenu pilsētā, kur ierauga, kā bergenu karalis apēd vienu trolli. Tomēr Popijas domas ir tādas, ka šis trollis tomēr ir izdzīvojis. Viņi atklāj, kur troļļus tur gūstā un kas tos uzrauga. To uzraudzītāja ir virtuves darbiniece Bridžita, kuru ir apbūris karalis. Viņa piekrīt atbrīvot ieslodzītos un ļaut Popijai un Zaram piekļūt karalim, ja viņai būs iespēja ar karali aiziet uz randiņu. Gatavojoties randiņam, Popija un Zars sastrīdas, jo Zars atsakās dziedāt, apgalvojot, ka dziedāšana nogalināja viņa vecmāmiņu, un šis notikums padarīja viņu pelēku. Bridžita tiek sapucēta kā lēdija, un viņa kopā ar karali dodas braukt ar skrituļslidām un uz restorānu. Troļļi tomēr nespēj Bridžitu pārvērst lēdijā uz visiem laikiem, un Bridžita sāk raudāt. Viņi mēģina izglābt troļļus, taču glābšanas laikā arī Popija tiek ieslodzīta. Popijai zūd cerības, un visi troļļi paliek pelēki. Zars sāk dziedāt un atzīstas mīlestībā. Visiem par pārsteigumu, troļļiem atgriežas krāsas, arī Zaram. Troļļus taisās apēst, bet Bridžita viņus izglābj. Karalis un citi bergeni atklāj, ka viņiem troļļi nav jāapēd, lai kļūtu laimīgi. Troļļi un bergeni laimīgi sāk dzīvot saticīgi, un Popiju kronē par troļļu karalieni.

programme.title: Ups! Piedzīvojumi turpinās
programme.desc: Uz Noasa šķirsta kļūst nemierīgi – kuģis pārāk ilgi kuģo pa jūru, zeme nav redzama un pārtikas krājumi sarūk arvien vairāk. Kādu dienu ceļotāji patiešām atklāj salu, taču uz tās ir aktīvs vulkāns, un arī salas iedzīvotāji nav visai viesmīlīgi.

programme.title: Alvins un burunduki
programme.desc: Komponists Deivs jau krietnu laiku cenšas gūt panākumus mūzikas nozarē. Lai gan viņa bijušais studiju biedrs ir ticis augstā amatā kādā ierakstu kompānijā, Deivam nekādi neizdodas sasniegt mērķi. Stāvoklis kļūst cerīgāks, kad Deivs iepazīstas ar trim dziedošiem burundukiem, kas slēpjas Ziemsvētku eglītē ierakstu kompānijas galvenajā ēkā.

programme.title: Pēdējais elpas vilciens
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par dziļjūras nirējiem, kas cīnās, lai izglābtu savu komandas biedru, iesprostotu desmitiem metru zem okeāna virsmas.

programme.title: Džeisons Borns
programme.desc: Bijusī CIP slepenā aģente Nikija Pārsone (Džūlija Stailza) reiz palīdzēja Bornam (Mets Deimons), pēc tam nozuda un šobrīd strādā kopā ar ziņotāju, kurš gatavojas nodot atklātībā CIP slepenās specoperācijas. Nikija ielaužas CIP sistēmā un lejupielādē visu, kas saistīts ar specoperācijām, tostarp operāciju "Dzirnakmens", kurā piedalījās Borns. CIP aģente Hetera Lī (Alīsija Vikandere) atklāj ielaušanos un par to ziņo CIP direktoram Robertam Dūvijam (Tomijs Lī Džonss), kurš ir specoperāciju galvenais vadītājs.

programme.title: Advokāts
programme.desc: Bagāts un veiksmīgs advokāts taisās precēties ar savu līgavu, taču drīz vien iesaistās sarežģītā narkotiku darījumā ar starpnieku, kuru dēvē par Vestreju. Plāns piedzīvo šausmīgu pavērsienu, un puisim jāsargā sevi un topošo līgavu, jo atklājas patiesība par narkotiku biznesu, un liecinieki tiek likvidēti.

programme.title: Kaķu mīlis
programme.desc: Koledžas studente Margo piestrādā nelielā kinoteātrī, kur iepazīstas ar biežu tā apmeklētāju, par sevi vecāko Robertu. Pāri letei aizsāktais flirts pārtop nepārtrauktā čatošanā. Kad abi nonāk līdz randiņam, Margo atklāj, ka dzīvē satiktais Roberts itin nemaz neatbilst tam Robertam, ar kuru viņa flirtējusi īsziņās. Skarbs vēstījums par dzimumu dalījumu, ķepurošanos cauri modernās randiņošanas staignājam un to, kādas bīstamas īpašības mēs mēdzam piedēvēt cilvēkiem otrpus mūsu telefoniem.

programme.title: Iebrukums
programme.desc: Kad kaimiņvalsts Veragva negaidot uzbrūk Kirasao un Arubai, tas pārsteidz Dānijas valdību nesagatavotu. Konflikts strauji attīstās, un trim dāņu komandas biedriem jāsaprot, kā rīkoties pareizi.

programme.title: Lielais Lebovskis
programme.desc: Neveiksminieks un slaists Džefs Lebovskis pārpratuma pēc tiek noturēts par miljonāru Lielo Lebovski. Bagātnieka sieva ir parādā ievērojamu naudas summu ļoti bīstamiem cilvēkiem. Divi pārskaitušies gangsteri ielaužas dīkdienīgā Džefa mājā un apčurā viņa paklāju. Dusmīgais Lebovskis dodas pie sava vārda brāļa, lai piedzītu kompensāciju par sabojāto grīdsegu, protams, iekuļoties virknē nepatikšanu.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Eintracht - Bayern
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. AS Monaco - Dubai Basketball
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Celta - Atletico Madrid
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: In a quick transformation with no demo required, Joanna creates an indoor garden-feel in the living room, dining room and breakfast nook of a home.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: With her youngest child, Crew, moving to the big kids room, Joanna expands her kitchen into Crews old bedroom and creates the pantry of her dreams.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Island Life

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn want to make a profit in uncharted territory. But theyll have to look past termites and spiders to see a homes true potential.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn land a rough house in a fantastic neighbourhood. The horrifying smells and birds inside dont scare them - but the tricky layout does.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: After a year-long wait, Kamohai and Tristyn face a never-ending nightmare after squatters take over a property in Waipahu, causing chaos and delays.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: A woman and her father have been trying to DIY her house for years, resulting in bad paint jobs and exposed floors. Now, theyre ready to hand the reins over to Jenn.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: Hoping to inspire guests, Joanna transforms the Seed and Supply building at the Silos into a flower art workshop and crafting space.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: Joanna updates an entry foyer and dining room with an elegant take on the homeowners Southwestern style, using earthy colours and refined details.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Log Cabin Living
programme.desc: A Tennessee couple look for a relaxing cabin. They want a place to practice music, archery and enjoy the quiet while staying close to the Nashville music scene.

programme.title: Log Cabin Living
programme.desc: After discovering Evergreen, Colorado, family of five are ready to hunt for a forever cabin in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Log Cabin Living
programme.desc: A couple hunts for a Connecticut cabin to raise their daughters. He wants land for privacy and hunting, while shes looking for an updated kitchen.

programme.title: Log Cabin Living
programme.desc: A couple ditches Boise, ID, for a slower pace in Garden Valley. They want a private, updated cabin where they can enjoy the areas outdoor activities.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Christina on the Coast
programme.desc: Christina on the Coast is an American home renovation TV series featuring Christina Anstead, an American real estate investor and TV personality. The series premiere focuses on Anstead renovating her new home following her divorce with Tarek El Moussa, with whom they hosted Flip or Flop show. The remaining seven episodes presents her fixing up other peoples homes in Southern California. She puts a greater emphasis on design, which is her favorite part of the house-flipping process and she is happy to be able to create a space people have dreamed of.

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: Two thieves dressed as fake cops make off with a half-billion dollars worth of world-class artwork from a Boston museum. Although the paintings are still missing, numerous suspects turn up dead.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: Rising from the sands of the Egyptian desert is one of the ancient worlds greatest wonders--the mighty Sphinx. This mythological creature, with the head of a human and the body of a lion, looks like its standing guard at the great pyramids of Giza.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: Its one of the most infamous and unsolved mob murders--notorious mobster Bugsy Siegel is gunned down in his Beverly Hills living room. Bugsy Siegel made a lot of enemies across the country, but who killed him, and why?

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: Rising from the sands of the Egyptian desert is one of the ancient worlds greatest wonders--the mighty Sphinx. This mythological creature, with the head of a human and the body of a lion, looks like its standing guard at the great pyramids of Giza.

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: Two thieves dressed as fake cops make off with a half-billion dollars worth of world-class artwork from a Boston museum. Although the paintings are still missing, numerous suspects turn up dead.

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Lost Relics of the Knights Templar
programme.desc: Lost Relics of the Knights Templar follows the exploits of treasure hunters Hamilton White and his long-time friend, Carl Cookson, as they search for the treasure hoard reputed to have belonged to the legendary Knights Templar. The mysterious Knights were the equivalent of todays special forces and were the most skilled fighters in the ranks of the Crusaders. However, up until the present day, no major item belonging to the Knights has ever been discovered. But Hamilton and Carl believe that they have now found a treasure trove that reveals who the Knights were, how they practised their beliefs, and why they were hunted, imprisoned and disbanded by Papal decree in 1307. Experts offer their analysis and opinion to clarify the history.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: In Colorados Rocky Mountains, a terrifying creature hunts elk and frightens residents. Centuries-old stories describe encounters with a screaming beast. MonsterQuest investigates, searching for evidence of the legendary Snowbeast on Pikes Peak.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Sharks have terrified people for centuries and deep within the forbidding waters of Mexicos Baja Peninsula may lurk a mammoth sixty foot monster. Could it be a new giant species or some living relic, hidden in the sea?

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways the World Will End
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: Clash of the Gods
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. programme.title: Murder In the Heartland
programme.desc: This series focuses on the dark underbelly of the American mid-west, its heartland. Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The show includes interviews with the victims family, friends, law enforcement officers and also provides dramatic reenactments to bring the stories to life. Episodes reveal true stories such as when an Oklahoma familys dog drops a human skull onto their porch and the police are called in to investigate; a bride-to-be who discovers her betrothed shot in the head in their living room; a beloved father, son and fiancee who is discovered beaten to death in his own driveway; and a devoted family man who diappears after his truck is set on fire.

programme.title: Who Killed Jane Doe?
programme.desc: A true-crime documentary series examining murders of women and the two aspects of each case; the detectives pursuing the killer and the family struggling to come to terms with their loss. With dramatised reconstructions to portray the events as they happened, each episode focusses on a different, chilling murder, listening to both the professional and personal side of a murder investigation. Whilst detectives scour crime scenes for evidence and clues to identify a victim, a family is waiting in vain for the impending announcement, aware of who the victim could very well be. A unique murder documentary series that offers a reminder of the delicate and poignant side to each investigation.

programme.title: Who Killed Jane Doe?
