programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs Cheetah
programme.desc: Caught on tape in Africas wild Serengeti is a stunning act of violence between two top predators. Three cheetahs are brutally attacked by two male lions - the first time an attack like this has ever been filmed. Now, filmmaker Leo Kuenkel, who witnessed the attack, is trying to make sense of it. Was this a once-in-a-lifetime "perfect storm" event? Or do these iconic African cats have a deep-set, sinister reason to fight to the death?

programme.title: Katavi - Africas Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavi is in the grips of extraordinary drought. A new litter of lion cubs is born into tough conditions, vulnerable to the attack of a rogue male, intent on taking over the pride. Water levels drop by the day, pushing two hippos to overthrow an alpha bull. Distant storms bring not rain but fire sparked by lightning. In the crushing heat, life desperately struggles to hold out for rain.

programme.title: The Pack
programme.desc: The story here examines the tactics used by a pride of South African lions as they hunt three distinct prey animals in the Singita Game Reserve. Well analyze the Prides unique strategies as they pursue zebra, impala, and ultimately the tallest land animal, the giraffe.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs Cheetah
programme.desc: Caught on tape in Africas wild Serengeti is a stunning act of violence between two top predators. Three cheetahs are brutally attacked by two male lions - the first time an attack like this has ever been filmed. Now, filmmaker Leo Kuenkel, who witnessed the attack, is trying to make sense of it. Was this a once-in-a-lifetime "perfect storm" event? Or do these iconic African cats have a deep-set, sinister reason to fight to the death?

programme.title: Katavi - Africas Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavi is in the grips of extraordinary drought. A new litter of lion cubs is born into tough conditions, vulnerable to the attack of a rogue male, intent on taking over the pride. Water levels drop by the day, pushing two hippos to overthrow an alpha bull. Distant storms bring not rain but fire sparked by lightning. In the crushing heat, life desperately struggles to hold out for rain.

programme.title: Katavi - Africas Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavis wetlands are unrecognizable in a prolonged drought, reduced to fetid, overcrowded mud wallows. At last, rains resurrect the river, inch by inch. Tensions wash away as hippos and crocodiles rejoice in the return of deep water … but flooding traps lion cubs in a precarious position. Normality will finally return to Katavi, but amidst global climate change, for how long?

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: We start on the tiny island of Batan, meeting a unique viper and a ubiquitous but also giant, land crab. Luzon is the main island of the Philippines. We drop in to Mindoro to see the most endangered large mammal in the Philippines, the tamaraw.

programme.title: The Pack
programme.desc: The story here examines the tactics used by a pride of South African lions as they hunt three distinct prey animals in the Singita Game Reserve. Well analyze the Prides unique strategies as they pursue zebra, impala, and ultimately the tallest land animal, the giraffe.

programme.title: Future Cat
programme.desc: Weve seen big cats past and their present, but until now we could never even imagine their future! With cutting edge visual effects, Future Cats explores far-off future challenges that may await the big cats. Leading experts discuss possible extreme planetary scenarios and the adaptations big cats would to need to make in order to survive.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Famous Tiger
programme.desc: Known as the Queen of Ranthambore, Machli is the most famous tiger in the world. The legendary tigress is a fearsome warrior known for her daring exploits. And shes the mother of an incredible four litters of cubs.

programme.title: Serengeti Speed Queen
programme.desc: Nzuri is the Speed Queen of the Serengeti - but being fast isnt enough. Shes constantly bullied by hyenas on the grassland and hunted by lions in the marsh. When two of her cubs are killed, the family is exiled to the transition forest. There, she learns to adapt her hunting methods and adds strategy to speed in order to outwit her enemies and steer her remaining cubs successfully to adulthood.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs Cheetah
programme.desc: Caught on tape in Africas wild Serengeti is a stunning act of violence between two top predators. Three cheetahs are brutally attacked by two male lions - the first time an attack like this has ever been filmed. Now, filmmaker Leo Kuenkel, who witnessed the attack, is trying to make sense of it. Was this a once-in-a-lifetime "perfect storm" event? Or do these iconic African cats have a deep-set, sinister reason to fight to the death?

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen
programme.desc: Narrated by Hollywood A-Lister actress Angela Bassett and produced by the Emmy-Award-winning producers of Planet Earth II, Blue Planet, and Hostile Planet, we journey with Malika as she deals with the hardships of moving from childhood to adulthood. The lioness must learn to hunt and help protect the pride from deadly intruders.

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin heads along the cliffs and sandy flats of the Australian coast to discover which animal dominates the shoreline. His first encounter is with a white -bellied sea eagle, a bird with extremely sharp talons, followed by the estuarine stonefish, the most venomous fish in the world. Finally, Phil takes a closer look at the notorious stingray.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: To see them stride across the Mara is a spectacle indeed. An undeniable band-of-brothers, these males significantly enhance their odds of survival against the larger super-predators of the savanna, lions and hyenas, and prove an attractive dynamic to the female spotted athletes also forging a living on the plains. But no partnership comes without its challenges and leadership amongst the group is not a done deal either.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: Australia, a continent unto itself…home to scores of creatures found nowhere else in the world. Among this myriad of species is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of animals, insects, and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predatory skills. Brilliantly adapted, beautiful to observe, they enthrall and amaze us. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying to their inner sanctums. From the Great Barrier Reef to the Outback, to the urban jungle, they creep crawl and live where we live, work, and play. The shows climax comes when it reaches the animal whose size, strength or fearsome reputation looms above all others. To best understand these animals, we not only examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed them to survive and thrive, but hear from someone whos met them first hand…and lived to tell the story. This first-person narrative offers both stunning detail and insight into why this animal is indeed considered one of the deadliest. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are Australias Deadly Dozen.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: After losing his mother and sister at one year old, he taught himself to hunt, but now has to deal with his other thieving relatives. Hes survived this long in spite of difficulty, and knocks down all stereotypes as he is not only social, but family oriented.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: From the National Geographic, this documentary series explores the deadliest animals that inhabit out planet. We travel around the globe to numerous different countries, continents and ecosystems, revealing the most dangerous animals in each location. Whether its the fearsome lions of Africa, the tyrannical tigers of India, the Amazons menacing giant anaconda, or the frightening creatures that lurk in our seas and oceans, this fascinating series with stunning cinematography takes a look at each creature in great detail, revealing how each one can be so deadly.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: She leads the formidable Sausage Tree Pride, an ensemble of buffalo-slaying huntresses. That is, until the migration crosses their prime domain and they demonstrate ultimate adaptability and switch prey species. But the pride has been compromised after a split-away group left their ranks and now she must muster her troupe to excel at motherhood while male coalitions complicate dynamics all around them.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: Identified by her burnt orange gaze, she leads a pride of five closely-related lionesses and their six offspring. They overcome every challenge as a precision unit: the gauntlet of the buffalo hunt or the upheaval of new males that could either decimate the prides ranks or offer her the chance to finally mother cubs. But desperate drought and crippling disease push the sisterhood to the absolute brink of survival.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: She overthrew the preceding ruler of North Clan in an unprecedented take-over, fighting her way up from a lowly rank to matriarch. She is both a ruthless battle commander, leading her clan in warfare against rivals and adversaries like lion, and devoted guardian to her clan and parent to her offspring.

An undeniable band-of-brothers, these males significantly enhance their odds of survival against the larger super-predators of the savanna, lions and hyenas, and prove an attractive dynamic to the female spotted athletes also forging a living on the plains. But no partnership comes without its challenges and leadership amongst the group is not a done deal either.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest
programme.desc: Wildlife documentary looking at the species that have a fearsome reputation. Travelling across the world, this series focuses on formidable predators of the natural world and the deadliest creatures in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: She leads the formidable Sausage Tree Pride, an ensemble of buffalo-slaying huntresses. That is, until the migration crosses their prime domain and they demonstrate ultimate adaptability and switch prey species. But the pride has been compromised after a split-away group left their ranks and now she must muster her troupe to excel at motherhood while male coalitions complicate dynamics all around them.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest
programme.desc: Wildlife documentary looking at the species that have a fearsome reputation. Travelling across the world, this series focuses on formidable predators of the natural world and the deadliest creatures in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: After losing his mother and sister at one year old, he taught himself to hunt, but now has to deal with his other thieving relatives. Hes survived this long in spite of difficulty, and knocks down all stereotypes as he is not only social, but family oriented.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: Australia, a continent unto itself…home to scores of creatures found nowhere else in the world. Among this myriad of species is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of animals, insects, and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predatory skills. Brilliantly adapted, beautiful to observe, they enthrall and amaze us. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying to their inner sanctums. From the Great Barrier Reef to the Outback, to the urban jungle, they creep crawl and live where we live, work, and play. The shows climax comes when it reaches the animal whose size, strength or fearsome reputation looms above all others. To best understand these animals, we not only examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed them to survive and thrive, but hear from someone whos met them first hand…and lived to tell the story. This first-person narrative offers both stunning detail and insight into why this animal is indeed considered one of the deadliest. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are Australias Deadly Dozen.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: From the National Geographic, this documentary series explores the deadliest animals that inhabit out planet. We travel around the globe to numerous different countries, continents and ecosystems, revealing the most dangerous animals in each location. Whether its the fearsome lions of Africa, the tyrannical tigers of India, the Amazons menacing giant anaconda, or the frightening creatures that lurk in our seas and oceans, this fascinating series with stunning cinematography takes a look at each creature in great detail, revealing how each one can be so deadly.

programme.title: Basketball: NBA
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pēc piedzīvotām likstām Barbabravo vairs nemaz nespēj pārtapt. Visa ģimene dodas viņam palīgā. Barbabravo nespēj nosēdēt mierā un ilgi koncentrēties vienai nodarbei. Barbalala piedāvā iemācīt viņam kontroli. Vai viņai izdosies?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons uzzina, ka kaijas mīl frī kartupeļus un darīs visu, lai tos iegūtu, bet vai viņš spēs nogādāt pusdienas, kamēr tās ir karstas? Bākas gaisma ir sabojājusies, un ir miglaina nakts, vai Padingtons var palīdzēt izglābt kuģi jūrā?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons vada dārgumu medības, lai atrastu kapteiņa Zaļbārža laupījumu, bet vai viņi paliks draugi un dalīsies? Ikviens vēlas uzvarēt smilšu pils konkursā un baudīt īpašu saldējuma balvu, bet galvenais ir komandas darbs!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēni ir sajūsmā, kad viņu mīļākā TV zvaigzne Henks Hammers grib redzēt, kā viņi strādā. Kapteinis Turbo ir sagādājis pārsteigumu. Kad saceļas migla, komandai ir jāuzceļ bāka.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons uzbūvē robotu, vārdā Padingtrons, taču, lai tas strādātu, nepieciešams īsts draugs. Bazs ielūdz visus uz Divali svinībām, Padingtons ir viņa strādīgais asistents, bet vai viņiem abiem izdosies izbaudīt svētku noslēguma uguņošanu?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un Toka skrienas ar laiku, lai redzētu pirmo pilno Saules aptumsumu savā mūžā. Padingtons saņem izgudrotāja balvu Simi vietā, kad viņa ir pārāk sakautrējusies, lai atzītos, bet kādēļ gan viņa pēc tam izjūt greizsirdību un skumjas?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Brauni dodas uz pludmali, lai pavadītu brīvdienas, un, ierodoties tur, satiek bākas uzraugu Šantiju. Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija apgūst glābēju praksi un ar glābēja Teilora palīdzību izglābj Brauna kungu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kas rada dīvainos trokšņus alā? Džonatans domā, ka tā ir nāriņa, bet Padingtons nav pārliecināts Džūdija vēlas atrast fosiliju pludmalē, pārējiem, šķiet, veicas, izņemot viņu, vai Padingtons spēs palīdzēt?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni pielipuši pie televizora, tāpēc vecāki mudina viņus veidot raidījumus. Barbapapas apmeklē evolūcijas muzeju. Programmā: Zemes radīšana, Pirmskembrija perioda zemūdene un... dinozauri!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus?

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pirmās Celtnieklīča bibliotēkas būvēšana ir bišu pilna. Tas pieprasa īpaši saldu celtniecības risinājumu. / Vectēvs Grants māca Čārdžeram visus savus labākos deju soļus lielām deju sacensībām. Vai noklīdušas disko bumbas dēļ viņi neiegūs pirmo vietu?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad komanda uzbūvē īpašu limonādes stendu Lūkasam un Lilija, īgnais Ātrmeistars ieripina to Celtnieklīča ielās. Kāpēc bebrs Krančijs šķērso ceļu? Jo Rabla komanda būvē tiltu, lai palīdzētu viņam nokļūt ceļa otrā pusē.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pēc piedzīvotām likstām Barbabravo vairs nemaz nespēj pārtapt. Visa ģimene dodas viņam palīgā. Barbabravo nespēj nosēdēt mierā un ilgi koncentrēties vienai nodarbei. Barbalala piedāvā iemācīt viņam kontroli. Vai viņai izdosies?

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepai un Džordžam jākārto viņu istaba. Pēc haotiskās tīrīšanas istaba ir gatava. Taču tīrību neizdodas saglabāt tik ilgi.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs dodas uz rotaļlaukumu. Tur ir arī Pepas draugi. Pepai patīk šūpoties, bet Džordžam ne, jo viņš baidās no augstuma. Tāpēc tētis palīdz Džordžam nošļūkt no kalniņa. Tas ir par augstu, un viņš iesprūst.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis piedāvā pielikt pie sienas Pepas un Džordža fotogrāfiju, kamēr mamma ir izgājusi. Viņš nejauši sabojā sienu, tāpēc Pepa un Džordžs palīdz to salabot, pirms mamma atgriežas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar ģimeni dodas uz pludmali, un viņi dara daudzko, tostarp ierok tēti smiltīs. Kad ir laiks doties prom, viņi gandrīz aizbrauc bez tēta, kurš ir aizmidzis.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Džordžs izlietnē atrod zirnekli, bet Pepai no tā ir bail, līdz viņa saprot, ka tas nedarīs pāri.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs dodas izbraucienā ar vectēva laivu. Arī suns Denijs burā kopā ar vectēvu. Abi vectēvi sacenšas, lai redzētu, kura laiva ir ātrāka.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar ģimeni dodas uz veikalu pēc tomātiem, spageti, sīpoliem un augļiem, bet tētis paņem šokolādi bērnu kūkai.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētim ir jauna videokamera. Pepa māca viņam, kā ar to darboties, tad viņš filmē Pepas rotaļas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Braucot ar riteņiem Barbapapu ģimene atrod viduslaiku pils drupas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēni apmaldās uz dabas takas un rod veidu, kā nokļūt mājās.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš pieskata krokodilu bērneļus. Dora un Zābaciņš pierunā Trolli nogaršot empanadu Benija kioskā. Zābaciņš uzlaiko Tiko izgudrotus zābakus. Dvīņi priecājas par savu pirmo pinjatu, bet neviens nezina, kā to dabūt vaļā.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz rumpuļiem pagatavot troļļa džemu, pirms Īgnais Trollis pārrodas, lai našķētos. Dorai un Zābaciņam jāatrod un jānoliek vietā burvju kaķītis, kurš visiem draugiem liek uzvesties kā kaķiem!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu. Barbagudrajam uznāk ģēnija cienīga iedvesma un viņš izgudro "Bam".

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabella lepni ģimenei paziņo, ka nolēmusi kļūt par princesi. Barbabravo nīkst no garlaicības, jo brāļi un māsas ir aizņemti un negrib ar viņu spēlēties.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Džūdija atklāj savu iekšējo varoni, kad reindžeru nometnē sākas vētra un viņiem ir nepieciešams patvērums Padingtons sadraudzējas ar ātru gliemezi, kuru gaida varonīga nākotne, bet kāpēc viņa izskatās tik skumja?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un robots Padingtrons izbauda varoņu lomu Vindzoru dārzos, bet kas ir tās dīvainās emocijas, ko izjūt robots? Padingtons atklāj, kā būt mierīgam saspringtā situācijā, un varonīgi aptur bēgošu kartingu!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un Brauni glābj tuklīšu mazuļus, kuri, tā vietā, lai veiktu pirmo lidojumu, apmaldās apmetnē Padingtons kopā ar Džonatanu un Džūdiju izbauda niršanas piedzīvojumu - bet kur ir Džūdijas kaklarota?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pludmalē valda nekārtība, bet vai visi atkritumi tiks savlaicīgi novākti līdz pludmales ballītei, ko visi ir tik ļoti gaidījuši? Vasaras brīvdienas ir beigušās, tāpēc ir pienācis laiks atvadīties no jaunajiem draugiem.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtona pasaule kļūst daudz plašāka. Viņš izlaužas ārpus Vindzorgārdenas robežām un dodas arvien aizraujošākos piedzīvojumos. Braunu ģimene dodas atvaļinājumā uz jūras piekrasti, aicinot skatītājus uz brīnišķīgiem piedzīvojumiem, apmeklējot tādas jaunas vietas kā Dinozauru sala un pat melnais caurums. Un no Peru pie Padingtona ciemos atbrauc ļoti īpaša viešņa –Lūsijas tante!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Vindzoru dārzos ir divi jauni varoņi - Misters Lieliskais un Retais Lācis, bet vai Džonatans un Džūdija būs sajūsmā? Džonatans tiek pasludināts par varoni pēc reta gnoma izglābšanas, bet vai glābšana bija tikpat varonīga kā viņa stāsti?

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīci ir pārņēmis noslēpums. Kad pēkšņi pazūd pilsētnieku skulptūra, Rabla komandai pievienojas Čeiss, lai atrisinātu pazudušās statujas noslēpumu... un uzbūvētu gluži jaunu Zinātnes centru, lai palīdzētu izmeklēt.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu. Barbagudrajam uznāk ģēnija cienīga iedvesma un viņš izgudro "Bam".

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabella lepni ģimenei paziņo, ka nolēmusi kļūt par princesi. Barbabravo nīkst no garlaicības, jo brāļi un māsas ir aizņemti un negrib ar viņu spēlēties.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar draugiem piedalās skolas ludziņā par Sarkangalvīti, bet Ponijs Pedro baidās būt uz skatuves.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vecvecāku papagailis Pollija ierodas ciemos. Pepai un Džordžam patīk Pollija. Viņa ir jautra un atkārto visu, ko citi saka. Kad Pollija aizlido, neviens nezina, kā viņu atrast, līdz Džordžs izdomā gudru plānu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ir auksta un vējaina diena. Parkā visas lapas kļuvušas sarkanas un dzeltenas. Ir tik vējains, ka Pepas bumba tiek iepūsta dīķi un Džordža cepure nonāk kokā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ģimene skatās "Detektīvu Kartupeli". Arī Pepa un Džordžs grib būt detektīvi. Tētis uzdod viņiem atrisināt mistēriju. Tedijs ir paslēpts, un Pepai kopā ar Džordžu jāizmanto palielināmais stikls, lai sekotu drupaču takai un atrisinātu noslēpumu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs spēlējas ar burbuļiem. Kad beidzas maisījums, tētis parāda, kā rādīt lielus burbuļus ar vecu tenisa raketi un ziepju ūdeni. Tad izveido lielu dubļu peļķi, kurā visi var izpriecāties.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ir laiks doties pie miera, Pepai un Džordžam ir jāiet vannā. Pēc tam viņi izmazgā zobus un lien gultā. Drīz vien viņi aizmieg. Mamma un tētis beidzot apsēžas, bet ir bijusi gara diena un arī viņi ir miegaini.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vecvecāki ielūguši Pepas ģimeni uz pusdienām. Ceļā Pepa, Džordžs, mamma un tētis nonāk sastrēgumā, tāpēc vectēvs nolemj aizvest viņiem pusdienas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar ģimeni bauda pikniku. Pastnieks Zebra un Zoja arī devušies piknikā, tāpēc viņi nolemj sanākt visi kopā. Kad laiks doties mājās, Pepa aizmirst savu lācīti.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Mistera Stingrā dvīņi apciemo barbabērnus. Barbabērni sarīko dvīņiem dārgumu medības un atpūtu dabā. Barbapapas sodas jaunā piedzīvojumā... dārzā. Taču dzīvot dabā ir negaidīti sarežģīti.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbapapa un Lolita ceļo gaisa balonā, bet vētra viņus aiznes uz vientuļu salu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pirmās Celtnieklīča bibliotēkas būvēšana ir bišu pilna. Tas pieprasa īpaši saldu celtniecības risinājumu. / Vectēvs Grants māca Čārdžeram visus savus labākos deju soļus lielām deju sacensībām. Vai noklīdušas disko bumbas dēļ viņi neiegūs pirmo vietu?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad komanda uzbūvē īpašu limonādes stendu Lūkasam un Lilija, īgnais Ātrmeistars ieripina to Celtnieklīča ielās.

programme.title: Dora

programme.desc: Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda būvē autosstāvietu saldējuma kafejnīcas klientiem. Rouza rīko kempingu, bet Rabls baidās no tumsas. Draugi uzbūvē zvaigznes.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš pieskata puķītes Zilo Atsperīgo, Margriezīti un Mazo Rozīti, lai Isa varētu doties uz karalisku tējas pēcpusdienu. Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz mazajai Andreai atrast burvju lapu, kas ļauj alebrihei saņemt maģiskās spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus? Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un viņa draugi nāk talkā konsteblam Velsam, lai atrisinātu pazudušā Vindzoras rubīna lietu. Pateicoties Lūsijas tantes īpašajai receptei, Brauni mājās uzsāk ēdināšanas biznesu, bet tas ir smags darbs.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam jāizvēlas starp Angliju un Peru, pirms sākas futbola kausa mačs, taču viņš abas valstis mīl vienādi stipri. Pienācis brīdis tantei Lūsijai doties mājās, bet atlicis laiks vēl pēdējam piedzīvojumam. Vai tomēr ne?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pirmās Celtnieklīča bibliotēkas būvēšana ir bišu pilna. Tas pieprasa īpaši saldu celtniecības risinājumu. / Vectēvs Grants māca Čārdžeram visus savus labākos deju soļus lielām deju sacensībām. Vai noklīdušas disko bumbas dēļ viņi neiegūs pirmo vietu?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad komanda uzbūvē īpašu limonādes stendu Lūkasam un Lilija, īgnais Ātrmeistars ieripina to Celtnieklīča ielās. Kāpēc bebrs Krančijs šķērso ceļu? Jo Rabla komanda būvē tiltu, lai palīdzētu viņam nokļūt ceļa otrā pusē.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīci ir pārņēmis noslēpums. Kad pēkšņi pazūd pilsētnieku skulptūra, Rabla komandai pievienojas Čeiss, lai atrisinātu pazudušās statujas noslēpumu... un uzbūvētu gluži jaunu Zinātnes centru, lai palīdzētu izmeklēt.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtona pasaule kļūst daudz plašāka. Viņš izlaužas ārpus Vindzorgārdenas robežām un dodas arvien aizraujošākos piedzīvojumos. Braunu ģimene dodas atvaļinājumā uz jūras piekrasti, aicinot skatītājus uz brīnišķīgiem piedzīvojumiem, apmeklējot tādas jaunas vietas kā Dinozauru sala un pat melnais caurums. Un no Peru pie Padingtona ciemos atbrauc ļoti īpaša viešņa –Lūsijas tante!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam ir grūti izvēlēties varoni īpašai foto sienai parkā. Varbūt viņam jāmeklē tuvāk mājām. Padingtons kļūst par varonīgu skeitbordistu, pateicoties Mateo un īpašai maskai, bet cik maģiska ir šī maska?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Teilors atklāj, ka ir viņa dzimšanas diena, bet kā lai draugi to padara īpašu, ja viņi par to nezināja? Ir Bērnsa nakts, un Bērdas kundze pastāsta Padingtonam par retu radību, ko sauc par savvaļas hagisu. Vai tas viņus apciemos?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Ir Zemes diena, un Padingtonam ir svarīgs uzdevums - iestādīt koku, bet vai viņš atradīs ideālu vietu, pirms ir par vēlu? Bazs rīko pavasara ražas svētkus, un visi tos izbauda, ienesot savas tradīcijas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabella lepni ģimenei paziņo, ka nolēmusi kļūt par princesi. Barbabravo nīkst no garlaicības, jo brāļi un māsas ir aizņemti un negrib ar viņu spēlēties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pamanījis, ka barbabērni iznieko ūdeni, Barbatētis aicina viņus klausīties amizantu stāstu.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Cosmo and Wanda grant a wish to make Hazels potato project work for the Science Fair, they rewrite the rules of science for the whole universe! When the physical world goes haywire as a result, they cant undo it because not even their magic is not working correctly! And Sci, the Science Fairy, refuses to help Hazel because he does not approve of her shortcut. Hazel must learn the real science behind her potato project to power up Cosmo and Wandas wands and set the universe right again. // After watching a detective TV show with her dad, Hazel wishes she could solve a mystery like a genuine gumshoe. At first, she is wrapped up in the thrill of solving a mystery, but things get real when the landlord goes missing. Everyone is a suspect - kids at school, the strange new neighbors, and even Cosmo and Wanda! Things intensify when Hazel suspects her family is the next target. In a dramatic climax at dinner at her neighbors, Hazel unveils the truth. Is it foul play? Or is it just her imagination?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Jasmine, and Winn take an online BFF compatibility test. To their surprise, they fail! Nobody is fazed, except for Hazel, who overthinks the results and wishes that her friends could know exactly whats in her head. Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, which lands all of them inside Hazels mind. As they go through her mind like a museum, Hazel continues to overthink everything they see. Now, Hazel must overcome her negative thoughts and battle a literal mind worm to get her friends out!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jack and Lily are half-siblings living on opposite ends of the world both hoping to have the "best summer ever." When dangerous events forces Jacks mom to send him to live with his dad, the kids fear their summer dreams have become a nightmare.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jacks new friend Beef invites him to a sleepover. Jack, a sleepover newb, freaks out over impressing his new friend.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its picture day at school! And on top of that, theyre serving the most delicious pudding at lunchtime! Only problem is, Dev has control of the pudding supply and is hoarding it. Hazel takes the power back by wishing that everyone had an unlimited supply of pudding. Pudding is everywhere and Dev is out of business! But things take a turn when people cant stop eating it and turn into pudding zombies. Now Hazel not only has to save picture day, but also stop a pudding apocalypse! // Hoping to win "Most Spirited Hair" for School Spirit Week, Hazel wishes her hair had spirit! Cosmo and Wanda take this literally and give her hair a spirit, bringing it to life as Diana the Diva! When Hazel and Diana "butt heads" over how best to showcase her, Diana runs away. Hazel chases her all over town but cant catch her. Later, Diana shows up at Hazels school aiming to enter the contest on her own. Hazel must find a way to reconcile with Diana if she hopes to win Diana back and win the contest.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazels feelings are hurt when her friends decide to go to the school dance instead of her book club. She storms off, but then realizes she wants to go to the dance too. Hazel wishes for Kennueth, a half-fish, half-man character from her favorite manga, to come out of his story and take her to the dance. Hazel must get through the dance before Kennueths true form, and magic, are revealed. // Hazel learns about the harmful effects of trash and pollution on Earth, so she wishes that people wouldnt be such trash monsters. Cosmo and Wanda summon a friendly, talking, trash eating dumpster named Danky! Together they spread the word about sustainability and caring for the earth. Then, Dale Dimmadome tricks Danky into helping him sell more products, making people even bigger trash monsters! Hazel must get Danky back and stop Dale Dimmadome in his wasteful tracks.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raphs strength wont save him when hes caught between the Mechazoids and the notorious street gang known as Purple Dragons! programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: While Cecil and Bunny celebrate their anniversary in outer space, Patrick and Squidina throw a house party. ) 19:15 Kamp Koral Join SpongeBob and his pals as they spend the summer building underwater campfires, catching wild jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck at the craziest camp in the kelp forest, Kamp Koral! programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken in Call the Cops!, then in "Surf N" Turf, Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in some help. 02:40 SpongeBob SquarePants Squidward joins a crew of sailors hunting down the great white jellyfish. Plankton finds a magic bean that takes him to a land of giants (well, more giant than usual). (Subtitled)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Ellie and the kids investigate cryptic Mrs. Withers. When Jack goes missing in her creepy home, Ellie and Lil must save him!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes she didnt have a gap in her teeth, the Tooth Fairy fills her gap with an obnoxious talking tooth.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

Then, Dale Dimmadome tricks Danky into helping him sell more products, making people even bigger trash monsters! Hazel must get Danky back and stop Dale Dimmadome in his wasteful tracks.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth. // Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Ellie and the kids investigate cryptic Mrs. Withers. When Jack goes missing in her creepy home, Ellie and Lil must save him!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth. // Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: When Max and Phoebe are due to attend Parent-Teacher night at school, Chloe asks to have her friends over to the house unsupervised. Despite being told no, she secretly invites Jinx and Booch over while her guardians are out. At school, Max convinces a reluctant Phoebe to lead an art demonstration for the parents, under the watchful eye of the schools vindictive superintendent. Meanwhile, Jinx discovers the Air Lair, and before Chloe can offer a good cover story, he assumes evil spies are secretly living at their home, and plan to target the parents at the school that night. Jinx races to the school to stop his imagined threat, disrupting Phoebes demonstration and putting the Thundermans cover jobs in jeopardy.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Sharing isnt easy for the twins and after a particularly heated argument they decide split the treehouse in half. // In order to win a local gardening competition, Best attempts to grow a plant, and Bester decides to be a plant.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Besters new pet comes between her and her brother. Theres nothing to it, Best must splat the cockroach! // Best and Bester go on an epic quest for a talking whale to prove they answered a board game question correctly.

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale
programme.desc: When Keesha redecorates, the hamsters work to save their favorite play place (Kendricks old recliner) from being thrown out. // When a mama bird mistakes Lil Pal for her lost chick, the hamsters embark on a royal rescue to save their friend.

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: It is pure luck to have a genie to fulfill all wishes, to have two of them is something incredible. Leah is a little girl with a genie bottle necklace, which includes Shimmer and Shine, genie twins. Shimmer is a genie with blue eyes and pink hair, encouraging and passionate, she has a pet, a gibbon monkey Tala. Shine is her twin genie with purple eyes and blue hair, big animal lover. Her pet is a little Bengal tiger Nahal. Zac is Leahs neighbor with red hair and blue eyes, and her best human friend. Leah is making three wishes every day, genies are doing their best but the results are far from perfect, as genies are very young and unskilled. This is the source of awkward and comic situations, but in the end girls manage to get over all difficulties.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: Rusty Rivets is a fantastic and picturesque animated series about Rusty who lives in Sparkton Hills along with his friend Ruby Ramirez, a robotic tyrannosaurid named Botasaur, and a group of smaller robots known as the Bits. Rusty is a smart inventor and a little genius who with the help of his amazing discoveries helps his friends out of difficulties. Rusty constructs robots of different sizes, forms and purposes, he is in love with science, technology and engineering. Together with his friend Ruby they can repair any old machinery and out-of-date equipment. Their splendid intellect arouses envy and toxic rivals do not play the game clean.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: While traveling towards the North Pole, the group almost gets captured by the Fire Nation. However, when a charismatic young man and his band of rebels attack the Fire Nations camp and rescue them, the gang learns that the rebels are trying to resist the Fire Nations motives to expand their territory. Katara and Aang really enjoy their time with the band of rebels, but Sokka soon discovers that they arent as noble as meets the eye

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mermaidman and Barnacleboy let SpongeBob and Patrick in on their secret heroic origins in Mermaidman Begins, and in Planktons Good Eye, Plankton uses SpongeBobs DNA to grow himself a second eye. 15:00 Rock, Paper, Scissors Rock, Paper and Scissors are three best friends who share an apartment together and compete over everything. programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
programme.desc: Po the Panda trains, battles, learns, teaches, stumbles, gabs and ""geeks out"" as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in his permanent home at the Jade Palace with the rest of the Furious Five, Po will have to take on new responsibilities and face brand-new adversaries (not seen in the movies) in his continuing education as the Dragon Warrior...for being the Dragon Warrior is not a destination, its a journey (unfortunately for Po, that journey is uphill).

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: After Draculaura accidentally offends the Codex and causes him to run away, she resorts to witchcraft to fix their friendship.//Lagoona must work up the courage to be honest with her ghostly ex-boyfriend when he comes back into her life to haunt her.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester go on an undercover mission to find out why items of laundry are going missing at the Dry Cleaners. // In an unfortunate case of mistaken identity, Best has been mistaken for the notorious jewel thief, Jimmy Muggins.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Besters record attempt is at risk when Best steals her thunder by being the robot instead of learning the robot. // On a search for the first woodpecker in spring, Best finds that hes in very much in tune with nature after all.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester turn themselves into chess pieces but have to abandon their game to save the sub from flooding. // Bester and Best are tasked with neutralising the enemy agents ransomware for the Bettervale Investigation Bureau.

programme.title: Harvey Beaks
programme.desc: Welcome to the peck-uliar world of Harvey Beak, a moderately mellow young bird who flies around his magical forest home of Littlebark Grove, with best-bird friends Fee and Foo, a pair of boisterous twins. The three feathered friends are always looking for new things to do, zooming around the forest embarking on adventures. With many other animals living in the forest, theres plenty of new characters and creatures for the trio to meet, often involving them on their mischievous escapades. Harvey lives with his parents, Irving Beaks and Miriam Beaks.

programme.title: Wallykazam!
programme.desc: Wally must get Ogre Dougs hyper pet Borgelorp to take a nap, and make sure he doesnt eat any purple flowers. But Bobgoblin has other plans. Can Wallys magic stick conjure some S words to save the day?

programme.title: Winx Club
programme.desc: Meet Bloom, a girl from Earth, who after she finds out that she is a fairy joins Alfea College on the planet Magix- a magical universe that is inhabited by fairies, witches and other mythical creatures. At Alfea College, fairy warriors from all over the universe study to improve their supernatural powers and here Bloom befriends five other fairies - Stella, the fairy of the Sun, Flora, the fairy of nature, Tecna, the fairy of technology, Musa, the fairy of music and Aisha, the fairy of waves. Together, this group of girls known as the Winx, become best friends and the force to be reckoned with as they experience incredible adventures while defending their universe from varous enemies.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Kamp Koral

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
programme.desc: Po the Panda trains, battles, learns, teaches, stumbles, gabs and ""geeks out"" as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in his permanent home at the Jade Palace with the rest of the Furious Five, Po will have to take on new responsibilities and face brand-new adversaries (not seen in the movies) in his continuing education as the Dragon Warrior...for being the Dragon Warrior is not a destination, its a journey (unfortunately for Po, that journey is uphill).

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob has failed his driving test - again. Pat is so outraged by the injustice of it all that he storms into the testing facility and takes the test to prove that it is an unfair test and impossible to pass. // An oversight in a Royal genealogy document reveals that Patrick is the next in line to receive a kingly title. Its not long before the power of the crown goes straight to the starfishs head.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.
